name: wynn
description:
Choose your own adventure game written for Weekly Game Jam 169 (Treasure Hunt)

Game was inspired by the Power of Myth documentary on Joseph Campbell.

Embark on an epic adventure with your childhood friend Doug across Greater London, through the Staralfur caves in order to retrieve the mystical Wynn treasure and face your destiny!

---

By lionbark

- Written in Emacs
- Title screen done with Krita
- Music with LMMS
- Built with Twine
